page.title: 18RUGBY'S RAILWAY TODAY.
page.content: Today trains travelling south go non- stop to London,Euston.Basicall the trains are of 2 types. 1.Inter-city Services between London,and Birmingham,N.Wales,N.W.Eng- land and Glasgow: 2.Local Services;stopping trains,using electric multiple units,between Bir- mingham(New Street),Coventry,Northamp- ton,Milton Keynes and London,Euston. Approximately 105 trains travel through Rugby southwards,and 103 trains northwards.Exact no. of pass- engers using Rugby Station is unknown; probably around 600.About 150 employ- ees work at Rugby.Some work away from the station.e.g.plate-layers and gang- ers.commuters are the station's main users.But when there are special events on in London or Birmingham, more people travel from Rugby.The main lines have been electified.
